channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Does the Hive Mind Work in ‘Pluribus?
item.description: The “Joining” seems to connect people via radio waves. Let’s dig into the physics at play.

item.title: The rise of ‘micro’ apps: non-developers are writing apps instead of buying them
item.description: A new era of app creation is here. It's fun, it's fast, and it's fleeting.

item.title: DJI Action 6 Review: The Best Action Camera Is Now Better
item.description: DJI's new action camera brings a larger sensor, a variable aperture lens, 8K video, interchangeable lenses, and more.

item.title: Smart Plug Guide (2026): When You Should and Shouldn’t Use One
item.description: Smart plugs can add controls to any outlet, but they aren’t perfect for everything. Here’s our guide to using one and which ones to buy.

item.title: Italy investigates Activision Blizzard for pushing in-game purchases
item.description: Italy has launched two investigations into Microsoft's Activision Blizzard, alleging the company has engaged in "misleading and aggressive" sales prac...

item.title: Anthropic taps former Microsoft India MD to lead Bengaluru expansion
item.description: Irina Ghose joins Anthropic as India managing director after 24 years at Microsoft.

item.title: Bluesky rolls out cashtags and LIVE badges amid a boost in app installs
item.description: Bluesky adds new features to its app amid a boost in installs due to the deepfake drama on X.

item.title: YouTube relaxes monetization guidelines for some controversial topics
item.description: These controversial topics include self-harm, abortion, suicide, and domestic and sexual abuse.

item.title: Why Everyone Is Suddenly in a ‘Very Chinese Time’ in Their Lives
item.description: The viral meme isn’t really about China or actual Chinese people. It's a symbol of what Americans believe their own country has lost.

item.title: 9 Best Wi-Fi Routers of 2026 for Working, Gaming, and Streaming
item.description: Don’t suffer the buffer. These WIRED-tested home routers will deliver reliable internet across your home, whatever your needs or budget.
